title: How to win every game with fizz
body:
Step 1, pick fizz.
step 2, take full ap runes
step 3, go top/mid/jungle/adc and if you get stuck with support just instalock kill lane and say the meta aint a rule
step 4, rush liandrys torment
step 5, max w
step 6, use ult and combo people till tehy have about 200hp than just walk away and let them think they got away or dance and watch them die while they can not do anything
step 7, report enemy kalista for afking
profit

{{champion:105}}
